Address.label: Address
Address.value: 400 WEST CESAR CHAVEZ, AUSTIN, Texas, 78701, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Silicon Laboratories Inc develops semiconductors software and system solutions for the Internet of Things Internet infrastructure industrial control consumer and automotive markets. The company operates through one segment mixed-signal analog intensive products consisting of diverse product areas which the company groups into four categories: Internet of Things broadcast infrastructure and access. The Internet of Things category is the largest contributor to the company total revenue. Geographically the company mainly operates in the United States and China with the U.S. the largest source of revenue.
